name: Belly Dance Fundamentals
description: Learn the basic movements and techniques of belly dance in a supportive environment. Perfect for beginners who want to explore this beautiful art form.

name: Advanced Salsa
description: Perfect your salsa technique with complex patterns and styling. This class focuses on advanced footwork and partner connection.

name: Khaleej Traditional Dance
description: Explore the rich cultural heritage of Gulf traditional dance with authentic movements and music.

name: Latina Dance Fusion
description: A high-energy fusion of various Latin dance styles including salsa, bachata, and merengue.
